fields.title: Issue
fields.placeholder: Tell us more about your problem...

faq.question: My university pass expires
answers: Did you report this to the university reception?

You can ask university reception on the 1st floor of the UI to re-release your card. You will need to pay a fine 300-rub. '
' Did it help?
